description:
Cozy studio located in the heart of East Village, short walk to Union Square, near subway, a supermarket, shops and hangouts. The room has an open kitchen, a full size bed and a full size sofa bed. One flight up.

The studio is facing street therefore, you will hear street noise.
name: Sunny and comfy home in East village
review: Min's place is in an awesome location - close to so many great places in LES and Alphabet City. It's also not too far from the Williamsburg Bridge and easily walkable to the subway if you want to go uptown. It's also very clean and comfortable. It's small, but perfect for one or two people, and bigger than a lot of hotel rooms in the city. I recommend staying at Min's!
